semantic_identifier: [GOLD-57]: Admin UI: Add audit log viewer for customer signal/PII access events
title: Admin UI: Add audit log viewer for customer signal/PII access events

sections.text: Create an admin-only UI in workspace settings to view access audit logs produced by GOLD-55 (reads, views, exports). Support basic filtering (time range, actor, action type, resource) with pagination and a CSV download that mirrors the filtered result set. Ensure the UI respects role/permission checks so only workspace admins can access the page and exports.
